title: Load Data
text:
Here’s a code example
import harp


file_cif = 'your_molecule.cif'
file_mrc = 'your_map.mrc'

mol = harp.molecule.load(file_cif,False)
grid,density = harpdensity.load(file_map)

title: Welcome to HARP
text: Here is some documentation/cookbook examples about how to use the Hierarchical Atomic Resolution Perception (HARP) package.

title: Installing HARP
text:
New Python Environment
conda stuff


Install package
pip install -e ./

title: About HARP
text:
Intro
HARP was a development that came out of the shape-calculation framework between ~2020-2023.
